oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bound as one volume; binding in very poor condition.
Imperfect copies: several pages torn, brittle or worm-eaten, some pages missing or badly mutilated.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.

Contains: 100 ginānjī:ćopaḍi..bhag trījo / Pīr Imām Shāh (Bombay, 1903) ; 102 ginānjī:ćopaḍi..bhag ćotho / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn (Bombay, 1904) ; 100 ginānjī:ćopaḍi..bhag:pāñćmo / Pīr Imām Shāh (Bombay, 1904).
